TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IResourceUrlGenerator

summary.span: 定義設計工具主應用程式必須實作的方法，以提供內嵌資源的 URL 參考查閱。

span.span: Defines the method that a designer-host must implement to provide URL reference look-up for embedded resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 2.0 版可讓您擷取內嵌的資源的組件的控制項，例如控制項。ASP.NET version 2.0 provides the ability to retrieve embedded resources from an assembly for controls, such as the control. 在執行階段，內嵌資源的 URL 可以使用擷取方法類別。At run time, the URL to the embedded resource can be retrieved using the method of the class. 若要提供設計階段的方法，用於產生的組件的資源 URL，設計工具的主機，可以提供實作的服務介面。To provide a design-time means for generating a resource URL from an assembly, designer hosts can offer a service that implements the interface. 如需詳細資訊：For more information: - 在使用中當地語系化的資源，請參閱[ASP.NET Web 網頁資源概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。On using resources in localization, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). - 在 使用內嵌的資源，請參閱[NIB： 如何： 使用資源來設定 Web 伺服器控制項中的屬性值](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb)和[How to： 擷取資源的值以程式設計的方式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28)。On using embedded resources, see [NIB:How to: Use Resources to Set Property Values in Web Server Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d8e0e5c0-1958-422b-b4f5-ebe63f6c45cb) and [How to: Retrieve Resource Values Programmatically](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7a06d512-6fc3-40ca-9cb6-7f41d1a9fa28). - 上的控制項設計工具，請參閱[ASP.NET 控制項設計工具概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810)。On control designers, see [ASP.NET Control Designers Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1d5a99d7-0a72-403e-812e-2c1ab595c810). 介面具有一種方法，會傳回給定的資源類型和名稱資源的 URL 參考的方法。The interface has one method, the method, that returns a URL reference to a resource given the resource type and name.

MemberSignature.Value: public string GetResourceUrl (Type type, string resourceName);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string GetResourceUrl(class System.Type type, string resourceName) cil managed
public: System::String ^ GetResourceUrl(Type ^ type, System::String ^ resourceName);
abstract member GetResourceUrl : Type * string -> string

param.name: type
param.span: 包含內嵌資源之組件中的型別。

span.span: The type in the assembly that contains the embedded resource.
The name of the resource to retrieve.

summary.span: 傳回用於設計階段時組件中的內嵌資源 URL 參考。

span.span: Returns a URL reference to an embedded resource in an assembly that is used at design time.

returns.span: 對資源的 URL 參考。

span.span: The URL reference to the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在執行階段，方法會傳回資源的 URL。At run time, the method returns a URL to a resource. 類別會定義用來載入內嵌的資源的 HTTP 處理常式。The class defines the HTTP handler that is used to load embedded resources. 在設計階段方法類別會偵測設計模式，並委派至設計工具主應用程式服務實作中，傳回的 URL。At design time, the method of the class detects design mode and delegates to the designer-host service implementation, which returns a URL.
